name: Bioceres Crop Solutions Corp.
description: Bioceres Crop Solutions Corp. is a biotechnology company focused on providing innovative and sustainable solutions for agriculture. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Rosario, Argentina, Bioceres develops and commercializes a range of biological products and traits designed to enhance the productivity and sustainability of crops. The company operates in the agricultural sector, where it leverages cutting-edge science to address the challenges of food security and environmental sustainability. Bioceres is particularly known for its work in plant biotechnology, including the development of drought-tolerant seeds and biostimulants that improve crop resilience. With a mission to empower farmers and increase agricultural productivity, Bioceres collaborates with research institutions and agricultural partners worldwide. The company is committed to promoting sustainable agricultural practices that minimize the environmental impact while maximizing yield and quality. Through its comprehensive product portfolio, including solutions for seed technology and crop protection, Bioceres aims to lead the transformation of traditional farming into a more efficient and eco-friendly approach. Bioceres is also engaged in the development of gene editing technologies and is actively involved in regulatory processes to facilitate the adoption of new agricultural innovations.
ceo: Federico M. V. de la Vega

key_executives.name: Federico M. V. de la Vega
